MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA26 postcode area of Girvan, affecting properties in Kings Gait and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have replaced a blown fuse at the substation at Burgh Yard and are now working on an underground cable fault near to Burgh Yard substation and we now expect your supply to be restored by 6pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.28pm on Monday 22nd February 2021.
